GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync), Excel, PDF, Word, OneNote, Powerpoint, Adobe Reader, Office 365, Outlook
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Hands Free, Loudspeaker, Call Divert

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports AVC, AVI, 3GP, MOV, MPEG-4, H.264, H.263, WMV, MP4, 3G2, M4V, Full HD

Camera.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus, Two-stage Capture Key, Carl Zeiss Tessar Lens, Flash Modes, Touch Focus, Exposure Compensation, Auto and Manual Exposure, Auto and Manual White Balance, Face Recognition, Full Screen Viewfinder, Geo-tagging, Optical Image Stabilization, Backsi, Image Editor

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v3, Supported Profiles (A2DP 1.2, AVRCP 1.4, PBAP 1.1, OPP 1.1, HFP 1.5)

Other Features.Important Apps: Mac Companion App, Google Talk, Twitter, LinkedIn, Windows Live Messenger, WhatsApp, Yahoo Messenger, Skype, Instant Messaging, Facebook, Gmail, Hotmail, YouTube, Nokia Mail
Other Features.Sensors: Gyroscope, Ambient Light Sensor, Magnetometer, Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Super-sensitive Touch, Corning Gorilla Glass 2, Wide Viewing Angle, Refresh Rate 60 Hz, Sculpted Glass, Nokia Glance Screen, Lumia Color Profile, Brightness Control, Sunlight Readability Enhancements

Platform.Processor: 1.5 GHz + Qualcomm Snapdragon S4, Dual Core
